name: RIBEYE A LA PIAZZA
description: Ribeye steak, king prawns and baby prawns cooked in a homemade lobster sauce.

name: SALTIMBOCCA RIBEYE
description: Ribeye steak served with baby prawns, mixed peppers cooked in a creamy garlic sauce.

name: FILLET SURF & TURF
description: Fillet steak served with king prawns in a white wine and garlic sauce.

name: FILLET LA PIAZZA
description: Medallion fillet tower, goats cheese and black pudding finished with rosemary demi-glaze.

name: STEAK SAUCES
description: Peppercorn, Diane, A la Creme, Demi Glaze

name: LAMB SHANK**
description: Cooked in a juicy demi-glaze with rosemary and served with vegetables and mash.

name: LAMB CHOPS**
description: Grilled lamb chops, served with creamy mashed potatoes and medley of seasonal mixed vegetables. Choose between a refreshing mint sauce or rich gravy.

name: MIXED SIZZLER
description: Stripped beef, chicken, bacon, baby prawns tiger prawns and mixed peppers cooked with a choice of sweet chilli or BBQ sauce.

name: STROGANOFF**
description: Diced lean beef cooked in a demi glaze, onions, mushrooms, cream and mustard sauce, served with timbale of rice
